snippet.title: Alterium Shift Trailer - Official Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2022
snippet.description:
Choose between three different playable characters in this retro-inspired Pixel-art RPG. Your character choice determines your story, and you'll even overlap with other playable characters! Coming to PC and consoles, with a PC demo releasing Q3 2022.

#GameTrailers
